Key Match Events: DJ Herz pitched 4 2/3 innings, allowing 4 runs and 3 hits, with 5 strikeouts in his first game facing his former organization, the Chicago Cubs.
Pre-Game Insights: DJ Herz was looking forward to facing his former organization and had a personal reason to give a little more effort.
Post-Match Reflections: Herz was disappointed in his performance, particularly in the fifth inning where he allowed 3 runs and 2 hits, but he was still proud of his 4 2/3 innings of work.
Miscellaneous Highlights: DJ Herz was traded to the Nationals from the Cubs in the Jeimer Candelario deal on July 31, 2023.
Others: Herz will face the Cubs again in September when the Nationals travel to Chicago for their final road trip of the season.
